  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020803</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020803</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Paradigmas de la segunda declinación griega</string>
            <string language="en">Paradigms of the Greek second declension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paradigmen der griechischen zweiten Deklination</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Paradigmes de la deuxième déclinaison grecque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Paradigms do segundo declension grego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Paradigmi della seconda declinazione greca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραδείγματα της ελληνικής δεύτερης κλίσης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Esquema con los paradigmas declinados en singular y plural de la segunda declinación, según el género femenino, masculino y neutro y sus diferentes tipos.</string>
            <string language="en">Scheme of the declined paradigms in singular and plural of the second declension, according to the grammatical gender of feminine, masculine or neuter and their different types.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Griego</string>
            <string language="en">Greek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">paradigmas</string>
            <string language="en">paradigms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">segunda declinación</string>
            <string language="en">second declencion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwurf der gesunkenen Paradigmen in 
einzigartigem und Plural der zweiten Deklination, entsprechend dem 
grammatischen Geschlecht der weiblichen, männlichen oder sächlichen 
und ihrer unterschiedlichen Typen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arrangement des paradigmes diminués dans 
singulier et pluriel de la deuxième déclinaison, selon le genre 
grammatical de types féminins, masculins ou neutres et leurs 
différents.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esquema dos paradigms declinados em singular e 
plural do segundo declension, de acordo com o gender gramatical de 
tipos feminine, masculine ou neutros e seus diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema dei paradigmi ribassanti in singolare e 
plurale della seconda declinazione, secondo il genere grammaticale dei
tipi femminili, maschili o neutri e loro differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο των μειωμένων παραδειγμάτων στον ενικό αριθμό 
και πληθυντικός της δεύτερης κλίσης, σύμφωνα με το γραμματικό 
γένος των θηλυκών, αρσενικών ή ουδέτερων και διαφορετικών τύπων
τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paradigmen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zweites declencion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">paradigmes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">deuxième declencion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">paradigms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">segundo declencion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Greco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">paradigmi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">secondo declencion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παραδείγματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεύτερο declencion</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
